items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 40 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 9!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 75 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 16!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 220 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 45.

items.checkin_comment: Average, compared to others of the style I've had.

items.badge_description: Canadian Beer Day is a time to celebrate Canadian beer from coast to coast. Celebrate with us on October 9 by stopping in at your local bar, restaurant or brewery, or pick up a brew at your local store.

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 110 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 23!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking opening a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 25 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 6!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 36)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 37!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 35 check-ins with a photo.
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 25 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 6!

Fall is in the air and the holidays are just around the corner, but pies and jack-o-lanterns aren't the only things pumpkins are good for. Pumpkin beers have grown in popularity, bringing with them a delicate balance of malt and spices. That's 5 different beers with the style of Pumpkin / Yam! Try 5 more for Level 2!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 40 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 9.

Dispensed traditionally by hand pump, cask beers are best served at 55°F. This temperature allows all of the flavor nuances to emerge and permits appreciation of the often unfiltered texture. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Cask! Try 5 more for Level 2!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three Thursdays in a 30 day period!
Load up those hops, watch the IBU grow and drink it down! Now you’re all hopped up. The more bitter, the better. That's 10 different beers with an IBU of 65 or higher. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 145 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 30!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 215 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 44.

beer.beer_name: Green Farmer Pale Ale No. 12 Wet Hop

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 100 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 21!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 115 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 24!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 140 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 29!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 65 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 14!

Dating back to the 17th century, Brown Ales come in a number of varieties. With malty, nutty characteristics and a smooth finish, it's sure to cure your cravings.  That's 5 different Brown Ales. Try 5 more for Level 2.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 210 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 43.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 65 distinct venues!

Hiking, fishing, swimming - there are so many wonderful things to do while you enjoy the great outdoors. Even beer is better when surrounded by the beauty of nature. That's 5 different venues categorized as Great Outdoors. Visit 5 more for Level 2!

items.checkin_comment: Rounding up. Thanks for a great porter Jerry J.

items.badge_description: What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what!
